url.description: URL to where webhook requests will be sent. Must be HTTPS. Scheme and host will be converted to lower case. Result can be seen in the response.

events.description:
List of subscribed events.

 Allowed event types:
* `payment.reserved`
* `payment.expired`
* `paymentpoint.activated`
* `payment.cancelled_by_user`

paymentPointId.description:
Optional. Webhook will receive notifications only coming from specified payment point.
type: string
